thread.section_title: LD Mountain Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LD Mountain Centre | www.ldmountaincentre.com | 8 of 105
thread.title: Traxs
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Traxs

author: Traxs
title: Traxs
text: I recently purchased the Osprey Mutant 38, LD mountain Centre were the cheapest !! This a great pack that can bit stripped down to save weight, has great features and is the ideal size for a winter pack. As with all Osprey packs it is of high quality and made to last. I received good service and fast delivery from LD, thank you.
